SEARCH
Package game.upgrade

Interface UpgradableItemInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
HealingVial, Knife, StaminaVial, Sword, UpgradableGameWeapon, UpgradableItem
public interface UpgradableItemInterface
An interface used if an item is upgradable.

  • Method Details

    • findBlackSmithToTalkTo

      boolean findBlackSmithToTalkTo(BlackSmithEnum blackSmithEnum)
      Check if the blacksmith is nearby and the actor has the Talking to player capability.
      Parameters:
      blackSmithEnum - the blacksmith to check if it is nearby
      Returns:
      true if the blacksmith is nearby and the actor has the Talking to player capability. false otherwise

    • levelUp

      void levelUp()
      Increment the level attribute by 1

    • raiseBuffAttributeBy

      void raiseBuffAttributeBy(BuffAttributes buffAttributes, float amount)
      Increase the value of the buffAttribute key by an amount to represent a certain stat such as attack increasing.
      Parameters:
      buffAttributes - the stat to increase

    • checkItemHasAttribute

      boolean checkItemHasAttribute(BuffAttributes buffAttributes)
      Check if the item has the buffAttribute which it can increase its stats by
      Parameters:
      buffAttributes - the stat to increase
      Returns:
      true if the buffAttribute matches with a key from the upgradableStats list

    • getLevel

      int getLevel()
      Getter method to get the level attribute
      Returns:
      the level attribute

    • addToUpgradableActionsList

      void addToUpgradableActionsList(UpgradableActions upgradableAction)
      Add an upgradableAction to the upgradableActionsList
      Parameters:
      upgradableAction - the upgradable action to add

    • getUpgradableActionsList

      List<UpgradableActions> getUpgradableActionsList()
      Getter method for upgradableActionsList
      Returns:
      a copy of the upgradableActionsList
